T02D1222:22b-1: cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog / gdod nas thams cad de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1222:22b-2: gnyis med don gyi bdag nyid can //
T02D1222:22b-3: kye yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1222:22b-4: sngon po chos nyid mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1222:22b-5: dmar po thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D1222:22b-7: / he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1222:22b-8: spyan gsum rnam par thar pa gsum //
T02D1222:22b-9: dmar ba chos nyid chags pa'i don //
T02D1222:22b-10: h'um sgrogs skye ba med pa ste //
T02D1222:22b-11: kun gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1222:22b-12: g-yas na gdug 'joms rdo rje ste //
T02D1222:22b-13: g-yon na bde skyong ka p'a la //
T02D1222:22b-14: shes rab mtshon pa kha tvam ga //
T02D1222:22b-15: longs spyod rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1222:22b-16: thod pa ye shes lnga yi dngos //
T02D1222:22b-17: phyag rgya lnga ni rigs lnga ste //
T02D1222:22b-18: do shal phreng ba 'du byed spangs //
T02D1222:22b-19: sprul sku khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1222:22b-20: nyon mongs ma gos padma'i gdan //
T02D1222:22b-21: rnam rtog mi mnga' tshangs pa'i ro //
T02D1222:22b-22: ma rig sreg pa'i nyi ma ste //
T02D1222:22b-23: gos med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
